ValidationRule.description: Check if Price Book date is set to a past time at creation and update
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( ISNEW(), OR(COMM_ValidFrom__c < NOW(), COMM_ValidTo__c < NOW())), AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(COMM_ValidTo__c), COMM_ValidTo__c < NOW()) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Price books cannot be set in the past
